Text.Page: Hello, hello! I see you're eager to explore something again. Let me look in my notes. Well, well, well ... (Reading: Recently found out where to find a recipe for happiness ...) ... what is it? I don't remember writing this ... (reads: Argon Corpus.) ... That's all, no more information! It's strange ... It's not my handwriting ... I hate to send you off into the unknown, but if you check this place out, it wouldn't be bad ...

You came back alive, which means it wasn't some kind of a trap. What did you find in there? Wow, those really are shards of a new rune! Well done, thank you! But who left that note ... Oh, right, here's your reward!
Strange record ... Some kind of weird happiness recipe ... I hope everything will be okay ...
